casebody.data:
No. 11-6450. Andrew Mark Lamar, Petitioner v. Tom Clements, Executive Director, Colorado Department of Corrections, et al. 565 U.S. 1064, 132 S. Ct. 765,

181 L. Ed. 2d 493,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8582. November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 430 Fed. Appx. 718.
